mapper.select: SELECT gl.main_picture AS mainPicture, gl.good_name AS goodName, gl.`market_price` AS marketPrice, gl.`id` AS goodListId, 1 AS isPlatform, mfgl.`id`, (SELECT mfgs.free_price FROM `marketing_free_good_specification` mfgs LEFT JOIN good_specification gs ON gs.id = mfgs.`good_specification_id` WHERE mfgs.marketing_free_good_list_id = mfgl.`id` AND mfgs.del_flag = '0' AND gs.`del_flag` = '0' ORDER BY free_price ASC LIMIT 1) freePrice, (select label from marketing_free_base_setting limit 1) AS label FROM `marketing_free_good_list` mfgl LEFT JOIN good_list gl ON gl.`id` = mfgl.`good_list_id` WHERE mfgl.`del_flag` = '0' AND mfgl.`status`='1' AND gl.del_flag = '0' AND gl.status = '1' AND gl.frame_status = '1' AND gl.good_form = '0' AND gl.audit_status = '2' AND mfgl.`is_recommend`='1' and (SELECT mfgs.free_price FROM `marketing_free_good_specification` mfgs LEFT JOIN good_specification gs ON gs.id = mfgs.`good_specification_id` WHERE mfgs.marketing_free_good_list_id = mfgl.`id` AND mfgs.del_flag = '0' AND gs.`del_flag` = '0' ORDER BY free_price ASC LIMIT 1) is not null ORDER BY mfgl.sort asc

SELECT gl.main_picture AS mainPicture, gl.good_name AS goodName, gl.`market_price` AS marketPrice, gl.`id` AS goodListId, 1 AS isPlatform, mfgl.`id`, (SELECT mfgs.free_price FROM `marketing_free_good_specification` mfgs LEFT JOIN good_specification gs ON gs.id = mfgs.`good_specification_id` WHERE mfgs.marketing_free_good_list_id = mfgl.`id` AND mfgs.del_flag = '0' AND gs.`del_flag` = '0' ORDER BY free_price ASC LIMIT 1) freePrice, (select label from marketing_free_base_setting limit 1) AS label FROM `marketing_free_good_list` mfgl LEFT JOIN good_list gl ON gl.`id` = mfgl.`good_list_id` WHERE mfgl.`del_flag` = '0' AND mfgl.`status`='1' AND gl.del_flag = '0' AND gl.status = '1' AND gl.frame_status = '1' AND gl.good_form = '0' AND gl.audit_status = '2' and (SELECT mfgs.free_price FROM `marketing_free_good_specification` mfgs LEFT JOIN good_specification gs ON gs.id = mfgs.`good_specification_id` WHERE mfgs.marketing_free_good_list_id = mfgl.`id` AND mfgs.del_flag = '0' AND gs.`del_flag` = '0' ORDER BY free_price ASC LIMIT 1) is not null and (gl.good_name like concat('%',#{paramMap.search},'%') or gl.good_describe like concat('%',#{paramMap.search},'%')) order by gl.small_price asc,gl.sales_volume,gl.update_time desc order by mfgl.sort asc order by gl.sales_volume desc order by gl.update_time desc order by gl.small_price order by gl.small_price desc
